posts.raw_content:
We didn’t chant *“Lock her up”* for eight damn years just to have Trump sitting on Epstein’s black book like it’s a goddamn family recipe.

We didn’t bleed votes, take bans, lose jobs, and get called terrorists,
just to watch our guy protect the same swamp creatures we thought he was gonna nuke from orbit.

You said “Drain the swamp.”
Well, where the fuck’s the list?

We didn’t sign up to protect Hollywood pedos.
We signed up to *burn them all down.*

Now the base is done clapping.
No more rallies. No more merch. No more “trust the plan” bullshit.

**Either drop the names, or give us our country, our dignity, and our TrumpBucks back.**

Because right now?
This ain't MAGA.
This is just **MAGA holding the bag.**
